title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: If the user selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences, the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even though it should not be.
EB: The "Build" action should only be enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective if the user has not selected "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Go to the Java perspective.
2. Open Preferences and select "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
3. Right-click on a resource in the Java perspective.
4. Observe that the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is enabled, even though it should not be enabled.
